snippet.title: Shelter 3 Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Shelter 3 (Visit the Steam page here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/977630/) returns the player to the natural landscapes of Shelter. It is a chance to explore a much more sociable kind of animal existence, where motherhood, social harmony and inheritance are the keys to prosperity.
